tool_description: A clever and easy sentiment analysis for your apps
name: Magicsafe Sentiment Analysis
title: Magicsafe Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: synonyms_synonyms__word__get
api_list.description: This allows users to find synonyms
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://magicsafe-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/synonyms/man"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "magicsafe-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
